level.heading: Qualifications of directors.
level.text: A director of a nonprofit corporation shall be an individual. The articles of incorporation or bylaws may prescribe other qualifications for directors. A director need not be a resident of the District or a member of the corporation unless the articles or bylaws so prescribe.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-378
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.
